original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical implementation, blending strategic thinking with hands-on system configuration expertise. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective technical solutions, and ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs. With a focus on the vehicle configuration space, this position will leverage cutting-edge technologies like machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive innovative and efficient solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and align technical configurations accordingly
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and new feature implementations
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for process improvements, leveraging tools for data querying, reporting, and visualization
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work in close partnership with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Ability to break down complex technical information and present it in easily understandable terms to non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL and experience in data analysis, reporting, and visualization

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and experience in application development
- Understanding of Agile methodologies and their application in software development

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a technical configuration or business analyst role, with a proven track record of successfully implementing system configurations
- Experience in the vehicle configuration space, with a strong understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence, particularly in the context of business process optimization and system enhancement
- Familiarity with Agile project management practices and their application in delivering technical solutions

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] backend configuration
- Experience with data querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with version control systems and collaboration platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work in an Agile framework, participating in regular stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings
- Willingness to adapt to changing business needs and requirements, demonstrating a proactive and flexible approach
- Commitment to maintaining comprehensive documentation and knowledge sharing to support the team's collective success

Role Overview:
This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, serving as a critical link between our organization's strategic objectives and the effective implementation of our [mention specific system] backend. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for deeply understanding complex business processes, translating them into robust technical configurations, and ensuring our systems continuously evolve to meet the changing needs of the business. With a focus on the vehicle configuration space, you will leverage cutting-edge technologies like machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive innovative solutions that streamline operations and enhance customer experiences.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather comprehensive business requirements, documenting them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate the gathered business requirements into detailed technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and new feature implementations
- Develop and maintain configuration specifications, ensuring they accurately reflect the evolving business needs and technical capabilities
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, collaborating with cross-functional teams to validate functionality and user acceptance
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for process improvements, utilizing tools for data querying, reporting, and visualization
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to optimize business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Foster strong partnerships with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in SQL and experience in data analysis, reporting, and visualization to uncover insights and drive data-driven decision-making
- Ability to break down complex technical information and present it in a clear, concise, and easily understandable manner to non-technical audiences

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and experience in application development
- Understanding of Agile methodologies and their application in software development and project management

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a technical configuration or business analyst role, with a proven track record of successfully implementing system configurations and driving process improvements
- Demonstrated expertise in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence, particularly in the context of optimizing business processes and enhancing system functionality
- Familiarity with Agile project management practices and their application in delivering technical solutions within a collaborative, cross-functional environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] backend configuration
- Experience with data querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with version control systems and collaboration platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a strong focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work in an Agile framework, participating in regular stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings
- Willingness to adapt to changing business needs and requirements, demonstrating a proactive and flexible approach
- Commitment to maintaining comprehensive documentation and knowledge sharing to support the team's collective success and enable seamless knowledge transfer

Role Overview:
This is a unique opportunity to serve as a strategic bridge between our organization's business objectives and the technical implementation of our [mention specific system] backend. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for deeply understanding complex business processes, translating them into innovative technical configurations, and ensuring our systems continuously evolve to meet the changing needs of the business. With a focus on the vehicle configuration space, you will leverage cutting-edge technologies like machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive process optimization, enhance system efficiency, and deliver exceptional customer experiences.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather comprehensive business requirements, documenting them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows) to ensure alignment with strategic goals
- Analyze the gathered business requirements and translate them into detailed technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and new feature implementations
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, continuously refining them to reflect the evolving business needs and technical capabilities
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, working cross-functionally to validate functionality and user acceptance, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for process improvements, leveraging tools for data querying, reporting, and visualization to uncover actionable insights
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to optimize business processes, enhance system efficiency, and drive continuous improvement
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and enable knowledge sharing
- Serve as a technical subject matter expert, collaborating with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to understand complex business requirements and translate them into innovative technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, fostering a shared understanding of objectives and priorities
- Proficiency in SQL and experience in data analysis, reporting, and visualization to uncover insights and drive data-driven decision-making
- Ability to break down complex technical information and present it in a clear, concise, and engaging manner to diverse audiences, including senior leadership

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and experience in application development
- Understanding of Agile methodologies and their application in software development and project management

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a technical configuration or business analyst role, with a proven track record of successfully implementing system configurations and driving process improvements
- Demonstrated expertise in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements, as well as the ability to identify and address pain points

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence, particularly in the context of optimizing business processes, enhancing system functionality, and delivering exceptional customer experiences
- Familiarity with Agile project management practices and their application in leading cross-functional teams to deliver technical solutions within a collaborative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] backend configuration
- Experience with data querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with version control systems and collaboration platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a strong emphasis on continuous improvement, innovation, and strategic thinking
- Ability to work in an Agile framework, leading and participating in regular stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings
- Willingness to adapt to changing business needs and requirements, demonstrating a proactive, flexible, and solution-oriented approach
- Commitment to maintaining comprehensive documentation and knowledge sharing to support the team's collective success and enable seamless knowledge transfer
